item.title: Teen drug use remains low, but survey finds small rise in heroin and cocaine use
item.description: Teen use of alcohol, nicotine and marijuana remains at record lows, according to national survey results released Wednesday.

item.title: Could cheese protect your brain health? Study links high-fat cheese and cream to lower dementia risk
